Package MathLib

Class AABB

java.lang.Object
MathLib.AABB
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class AABB extends Object implements Serializable
Class for representing an Axis-Aligned Bounding Box.
Author:
Haotian

    • sweptAABB

      public float sweptAABB(AABB other, float minTime, int[] normal)
      Get the swept AABB for this AABB and another AABB.
      Parameters:
      other - the AABB to get the swept AABB for
      minTime - the minimum time to get the swept AABB for
      normal - the normal of the swept AABB
      Returns:
      the swept AABB for this AABB and the given AABB
